title: Lf Plat + ranked team to pratice in Adc only :) plat 1 ign Silkenfawn
body: I only play adc, i play in a team in the OOL and other tournaments :) just looking for extra practice and to make new friends :)

replies.body:
I don't know if I'm too low but I'm a Gold 1 support main that's always looking for good ADC's to queue with :)
Feel free to add me (this name)
